sentences.simplifiedText: 弟弟的期末考试马上就要到了。
sentences.traditionalText: 弟弟的期末考試馬上就要到了。
sentences.pinyin: Dìdì de qímò kǎoshì mǎshàng jiùyào dàole.
sentences.translation: My younger brother's end of term exams are coming soon.

sentences.simplifiedText: 随着期末的来临，图书馆里的学生显然比平时多了很多。
sentences.traditionalText: 隨著期末的來臨，圖書館裡的學生顯然比平時多了很多。
sentences.pinyin: Suízhe qímò de láilín, túshūguǎn lǐ de xuéshēng xiǎnrán bǐ píngshí duōle hěnduō.
sentences.translation: With the approach of the end of term, there are obviously a lot more students in the library than usual.
